languages.text: "Темные погрязли в круговороте мучений, отчаянно ища удовольствия в страданиях других. И эта машина — лишь инструмент их бесконечной жажды. Символ того, на что они готовы пойти, дабы утолить голод и страх, которые их поглощают".

"The Dark Ones are caught in a cycle of torment, desperately seeking pleasure in the suffering of others. This machine is but an instrument of their endless desire, a symbol of what they are willing to do to slake the thirst and fear that consume them."
languages.original_text: "Темные погрязли в круговороте мучений, отчаянно ища удовольствия в страданиях других. И эта машина — лишь инструмент их бесконечной жажды. Символ того, на что они готовы пойти, дабы утолить голод и страх, которые их поглощают".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「暗黒の者たちは苦悩の連鎖に巻き込まれ、他者の苦しみに喜びを見出そうと必死になる。この機械は彼らの果て無き欲望の道具に過ぎず、彼らを蝕む渇きと恐怖を癒すため、彼らが喜んで実行する物事の象徴である」
languages.original_text: "The Dark Ones are caught in a cycle of torment, desperately seeking pleasure in the suffering of others. This machine is but an instrument of their endless desire, a symbol of what they are willing to do to slake the thirst and fear that consume them."

traits.locale_text: 「暗黒の者たちは苦悩の連鎖に巻き込まれ、他者の苦しみに喜びを見出そうと必死になる。この機械は彼らの果て無き欲望の道具に過ぎず、彼らを蝕む渇きと恐怖を癒すため、彼らが喜んで実行する物事の象徴である」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “那些黑暗子嗣陷入了折磨的循环之中，拼命想从其他人的痛苦中寻求快感。他们总是想做些什么，来满足不断折磨他们的恐惧与饥渴，而这台机器便是他们满足饥渴的工具。”
languages.original_text: "The Dark Ones are caught in a cycle of torment, desperately seeking pleasure in the suffering of others. This machine is but an instrument of their endless desire, a symbol of what they are willing to do to slake the thirst and fear that consume them."

traits.locale_text: “那些黑暗子嗣陷入了折磨的循环之中，拼命想从其他人的痛苦中寻求快感。他们总是想做些什么，来满足不断折磨他们的恐惧与饥渴，而这台机器便是他们满足饥渴的工具。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Los Oscuros están atrapados en un ciclo de tormento, buscando desesperadamente el placer en el sufrimiento ajeno. Esta máquina no es más que un instrumento de su interminable deseo, un símbolo de lo que están dispuestos a hacer para saciar la sed y el miedo que les consumen».
languages.original_text: "The Dark Ones are caught in a cycle of torment, desperately seeking pleasure in the suffering of others. This machine is but an instrument of their endless desire, a symbol of what they are willing to do to slake the thirst and fear that consume them."

traits.locale_text: «Los Oscuros están atrapados en un ciclo de tormento, buscando desesperadamente el placer en el sufrimiento ajeno. Esta máquina no es más que un instrumento de su interminable deseo, un símbolo de lo que están dispuestos a hacer para saciar la sed y el miedo que les consumen».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Die Dunklen sind gefangen in einem Zyklus der Pein, sie streben verzweifelt nach Vergnügung durch das Leid anderer. Diese Maschine ist nichts als ein Instrument ihrer endlosen Begierde, ein Symbol dessen, wozu sie bereit sind, um den Durst und die Furcht zu stillen, von denen sie verzehrt werden."
languages.original_text: "The Dark Ones are caught in a cycle of torment, desperately seeking pleasure in the suffering of others. This machine is but an instrument of their endless desire, a symbol of what they are willing to do to slake the thirst and fear that consume them."

traits.locale_text: "Die Dunklen sind gefangen in einem Zyklus der Pein, sie streben verzweifelt nach Vergnügung durch das Leid anderer. Diese Maschine ist nichts als ein Instrument ihrer endlosen Begierde, ein Symbol dessen, wozu sie bereit sind, um den Durst und die Furcht zu stillen, von denen sie verzehrt werden."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les Eldars noirs se sont enfermés dans un cycle de tourments et ne peuvent désormais plus éprouver de plaisir que dans la souffrance des autres. Cette machine n'est qu'un instrument conçu pour assouvir leurs désirs insatiables, un symbole de ce qu'ils sont prêts à faire pour étancher la soif et apaiser la peur qui étreint leur cœur. »
languages.original_text: "The Dark Ones are caught in a cycle of torment, desperately seeking pleasure in the suffering of others. This machine is but an instrument of their endless desire, a symbol of what they are willing to do to slake the thirst and fear that consume them."

traits.locale_text: « Les Eldars noirs se sont enfermés dans un cycle de tourments et ne peuvent désormais plus éprouver de plaisir que dans la souffrance des autres. Cette machine n'est qu'un instrument conçu pour assouvir leurs désirs insatiables, un symbole de ce qu'ils sont prêts à faire pour étancher la soif et apaiser la peur qui étreint leur cœur. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Karalar, bir ızdırap döngüsüne kapılmış durumda. Başkalarının çektiği acılardan zevk almanın peşindeler. Bu makine de onların bu sonsuz arzusu için yalnızca bir gereç, onları tüketen susuzluğu ve korkuyu kovmak için yapabileceklerinin bir sembolü."
languages.original_text: "The Dark Ones are caught in a cycle of torment, desperately seeking pleasure in the suffering of others. This machine is but an instrument of their endless desire, a symbol of what they are willing to do to slake the thirst and fear that consume them."

traits.locale_text: "Karalar bir ızdırap döngüsüne yakalanmış durumdalar, başkalarının çektiği acılardan zevk almanın peşindeler. Bu makine de onların bu sonsuz arzusu için yalnızca bir gereç, onları tüketen susuzluğu ve korkuyu kovmak için neler yapabileceklerinin bir sembolü."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
